scripts.build: npm run build:components && npm run build:dependencies && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:components: npm run build:viewer && npm run build:search && npm run build:toc
scripts.build:viewer: npm run less:viewer && npm run concat:js:viewer_deps && npm run concat:js:viewer && coffee -o js js/SGAviewer.coffee
scripts.build:assets: npm run concat:css:default && npm run copy:fonts
scripts.build:dependencies: npm run concat:js:dependencies && npm run concat:js:component_deps && npm run concat:js:viewer_deps && npm run build:openseadragon
scripts.build:openseadragon: npm run setup:openseadragon && grunt --base node_modules/OpenSeadragon/ --gruntfile node_modules/OpenSeadragon/Gruntfile.js --force && npm run copy:openseadragon
scripts.copy:fonts: n-copy --source node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ --destination fonts fontawesome-webfont.woff fontawesome-webfont.woff2 fontawesome-webfont.ttf
scripts.concat:js:viewer: n-concat components/viewer/src/intro.coffee components/viewer/src/utils.coffee components/viewer/src/data.coffee components/viewer/src/component.coffee components/viewer/src/view.coffee components/viewer/src/router.coffee > js/SGAviewer.coffee
